columns.name: selection_name
columns.description: The display name of a resource selection document.

columns.name: selection_id
columns.description: Uniquely identifies a request to assign a set of resources to a backup plan.

columns.name: backup_plan_id
columns.description: An ID that uniquely identifies a backup plan.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) specifying the backup selection.

columns.name: creation_date
columns.description: The date and time a resource backup plan is created.

columns.name: creator_request_id
columns.description: An unique string that identifies the request and allows failed requests to be retried without the risk of running the operation twice.

columns.name: iam_role_arn
columns.description: Specifies the IAM role Amazon Resource Name (ARN) to create the target recovery point.

columns.name: list_of_tags
columns.description: An array of conditions used to specify a set of resources to assign to a backup plan.

columns.name: resources
columns.description: Contains a list of BackupOptions for a resource type.
